channel.title: Making an animation loop? [pi]

item.title: Making an animation loop? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @patargangstar patargangstar
item.description:
@patargangstar wrote:

ok so basically what i wanna do is

take this command

		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("afk")) {
			c.startAnimation(2939);
			c.updateRequired = true;
			c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		}

and make the animation loop so he keeps sitting like that

Read full topic
